name: Geotrek
tagline: Paths management for National Park and Tourism organizations.
body:
**Geotrek**, 

![Geotrek logo](http://depot.makina-corpus.org/public/geotrek/logo-128.png)

## Modules métiers

* Foncier
* Aménagements
* Signalétique
* Travaux
* Offre randonnée

## Technologies

* PostGIS 2
* python | Django
* Javascript | Leaflet

## Documentation

[Installation and configuration instructions](http://geotrek.readthedocs.org)

## License

* OpenSource - BSD
* Copyright (c) Parc National des Écrins - Parc National du Mercantour - Parco delle Alpi Marittime - Makina Corpus

![http://www.mercantour.eu](http://depot.makina-corpus.org/public/geotrek/logo-pnm.png)
